hook.text: An anecdote is a quick moment. A story has structure and meaning.

buildup.text: Anecdotes illustrate points. Stories ARE the point.

discovery.text: A story has character, conflict, resolution, and transformation.

twist.text: Many speakers think they're telling stories but just share anecdotes.

climax.text: Full stories carry more emotional weight than quick anecdotes.

punchline.text: Know the difference. Use both purposefully.
